[Assistant] Action: {"progress":"I've taken multiple screenshots but haven't actually started the investigation. The Elements list consistently shows 0 items, which suggests the page may not be fully loaded or the element detection isn't working. I need to view the actual screenshot to see what's really on screen.","blocker":"Cannot see any interactive elements in the Elements list - it's been empty for all 5 steps. Need to view the screenshot image files directly to understand what UI is actually visible.","expectedSignal":"I will see the dashboard UI with widgets, toolbar buttons, and ideally a way to input text queries","confidence":0.7,"type":"done","reasoning":"I'm stuck because the Elements list shows 0 items every time, making it impossible to select targets using the required selector format. Without seeing actual element names/roles, I cannot construct valid target selectors to interact with the page. The repeated empty Elements list suggests either a page loading issue or an element detection problem that prevents me from proceeding with the 5-turn investigation."}
